snippet: LEAD: Slow sales of Pontiac Firebirds and Chevrolet Camaros have prompted the General Motors Corporation to elminate 1,900 jobs at a California assembly plant, but a new plan may save workers from permanent layoff, the nation's largest auto maker ...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: Slow sales of Pontiac Firebirds and Chevrolet Camaros have prompted the General Motors Corporation to elminate 1,900 jobs at a California assembly plant, but a new plan may save workers from permanent layoff, the nation's largest auto maker said today.

headline.main: G.M. Job Cuts May Be Eased
